title: All On Zero
description: Just before her 36th birthday, Dawn, an aspiring author, decides to abandon London and return to Greece, in order to write her first novel. When she meets Stavros, a croupier, in the casino, everything seems the favor of Fortune, love, inspiration.However, both hide their true face behind a wall of secrets. In every rotation of the roulette they will both bet at each other’s secret self, experimenting with their own existence and taking the riskiest bets.The game goes on, the roulette is spinning and the stakes are high. Will they risk it all, if that means they might win the jackpot of a lifetime?A thrilling literary romance from best-selling Greek author Argiro Mantoglou, for the first time translated into English.“Argiro Mantoglou offers us a complex multi-focal novel, which is among her best.” – Avgi Newspaper, Greece
author: Argiro Mantoglou
